sentences.english: This article introduces dyeing of polyamide-66 with brilliant fast reactive dyes.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了锦纶66用艳丽牢活性染料染色的方法。

sentences.english: He had suggested that we might keep an eye open for any large or colorful spiders .
sentences.chinese: 他建议我们留心色彩艳丽或大的蜘蛛。

sentences.english: They made comments about the too-colourful waistcoats that he wore.
sentences.chinese: 他们对他色彩艳丽的马甲横加评论。

sentences.english: What impressed me most were the Jin Carp with colorful appearance there.
sentences.chinese: 给我们印象很深的是那里的锦鲤，色彩很艳丽。

sentences.english: Clear picture, colorful, fast and good.
sentences.chinese: 画面清晰，色彩艳丽，既快又好。

sentences.english: Amber has a beautiful yellow-brown colour.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀色彩艳丽，呈黄褐色。

sentences.english: Colored leaf its transfer picture with color paint , is it take off spend gorgeous to line with entirely.
sentences.chinese: 其花叶则用色漆调画，整个衬脱花的艳丽。

sentences.english: Your quiet is as if the vacuum out space, your bright is as pink clouds on the North Pole.
sentences.chinese: 你的宁静若外宇真空，你的艳丽似北极彩霞。
她穿一件艳丽的连衫“裙”。

sentences.english: Paris is the capital of France, and is one of the liveliest cities in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎是法国的首都，并且是欧洲最艳丽的城市之一。

sentences.english: The garden was gay with red geraniums.
sentences.chinese: 花园里红色的天竺葵花色彩艳丽。

sentences.english: The association between pollinators and showy flowers is well known.
sentences.chinese: 虫媒和艳丽花朵的关系人所共知。

sentences.english: Colorful gingerbread houses like this one are scattered throughout Port-au-Prince.
sentences.chinese: 这些色彩艳丽的房子零零散散的分布在太子港。

sentences.english: Glossy colors, dried soon, could be mixed with photosensitive ink of all brands.
sentences.chinese: 颜色艳丽，印迹快干，能与进口各品牌光敏印油混用。

sentences.english: In the shop, he sifted through a big bin of brightly packaged condoms.
sentences.chinese: 在商店里，他仔细审视这一大盒包装艳丽的避孕套。

sentences.english: The bright colors of the flowers arrested Susan's attention.
sentences.chinese: 花的艳丽色彩吸引了苏珊的注意。

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
